00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"

00040 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00041 
00042 std::string ScalarAddQualityMetric::get_name() const
00043 {
00044   std::ostringstream str;
00045   str << mMetric->get_name() << "+" << mOffset;
00046   return str.str();
00047 }
00048 
00049 void ScalarAddQualityMetric::get_evaluations( PatchData& pd, 
00050                                               std::vector<size_t>& handles, 
00051                                               bool free_vertices_only,
00052                                               MsqError& err )
00053 { 
00054   mMetric->get_evaluations( pd, handles, free_vertices_only, err );
00055   MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00056 }
00057 
00058 bool ScalarAddQualityMetric::evaluate( PatchData& pd, size_t handle, double& value, MsqError& err )
00059 {
00060   bool rval = mMetric->evaluate( pd, handle, value, err );
00061   value += mOffset;
00062   return rval;
00063 }
00064 
00065 bool ScalarAddQualityMetric::evaluate_with_indices( PatchData& pd,
00066                                                     size_t handle,
00067                                                     double& value,
00068                                                     std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00069                                                     MsqError& err )
00070 {
00071   bool rval = mMetric->evaluate_with_indices( pd, handle, value, indices, err );
00072   value += mOffset;
00073   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && rval;
00074 }
00075 
00076 bool ScalarAddQualityMetric::evaluate_with_gradient( PatchData& pd,
00077                                                    size_t handle,
00078                                                    double& value,
00079                                                    std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00080                                                    std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00081                                                    MsqError& err )
00082 {
00083   bool rval = mMetric->evaluate_with_gradient( pd, handle, value, indices, gradient, err );
00084   value += mOffset;
00085   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && rval;
00086 }
00087   
00088   
00089 bool ScalarAddQualityMetric::evaluate_with_Hessian( PatchData& pd,
00090                                                   size_t handle,
00091                                                   double& value,
00092                                                   std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00093                                                   std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00094                                                   std::vector<Matrix3D>& Hessian,
00095                                                   MsqError& err )
00096 {
00097   bool rval = mMetric->evaluate_with_Hessian( pd, handle, value, indices, gradient, Hessian, err );
00098   value += mOffset;
00099   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && rval;
00100 }
